oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2004-05-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 4, 2004. Hosted by Joe Nichols.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Nichols;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening comments by Kyle Young – Introduction of Joe Nichols and comments by Justine Gregory – What Makes Me Happy (Kim Copeland with Alisha House and Matthew Martinez) – Lazy Bag Of Bones (Kathy Hussey with Sharvis Dawkins) – My Light Has Gone Out (Casey Kelly with Elana Rosenthal) – Homework Blues (Gary Culley with Lee Lewis) – Things Change (Tricia Walker with Victoria Connelly and Hailey Hunt) – Leaving Puerto Rico (Betsy Jackson with Coral Rivera) – I Used To Be Missing You (Rich Fagan with Anjelica Hayes) – Dream (Simon McCain with Christine Wilt) – Mama’s Cheese Toast (Jeff Chase with Mary Kate Collins) – About Words and Music (Kelley Jones) – Doctor’s Office (Steven Farmer with Nick Githens, Riley Manion, Josh Thibaudeau, Mitchell Torrence and Tyler Welch) – Just Another Pretty Girl (Debra Adams with Kiran Schumpert) – Basketball (Steve Nelson with Demetrius Perry and Dylan Whitaker) – Colors Don’t Matter (Tim Buppert with Adrienne Bowman, and Fernanda Sandoval) – It’s Better Here (Jerry Vandiver with Jeremy Roberts) – Patches All Over (Bob Spanburgh with Katie Williams) – I’m On A Diet (Craig Monday with Whitley Chamberlain, Dana Ebb and Jennifer Heibig) – The Bright Side (Sandy Ramos with James Pickens) – Summer (Jeff Dayton with Kristi Pine) -- The Impossible (Joe Nichols).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Nichols, Joe; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
